text:
Law and Order: SVU’s Mariska Hargitay Pens Touching Tribute to Her Show Crew

Law & Order: SVU’s Mariska Hargitay is paying tribute to her crew. The star and executive producer of NBC’s long-running police drama took to Instagram to mark the end of season 18…

http://ift.tt/2rl7UKq
